Title: And My Paralyzing Fear Of Death
Plot: Patty receives a mysterious threat at her office that could destroy her case against Arthur Frobisher. Ellen continues to struggle with the demands of her new job at Hewes and Associates.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sex scenes
Writer: Glenn Kessler, Daniel Zelman, Todd A. Kessler
GuestStars: Real Andrews, Neal Matarazzo, Michael Stuhlbarg, Nestor Serrano, Jeffrey M. Marchetti, Mick O'Rourke, Marc Aden Gray, John E. Mack, Mark Zimmerman, Zachary Booth, Linda Powell, Jack Gilpin, Peter McRobbie, Donnie
